mapper.sql: select id, drug_id, warehouse_code, drug_name, drug_alisa, expiration_time, insert_num, residue_num, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, is_delete from t_warehouse_manager
mapper.insert:
insert into t_warehouse_manager
id, drug_id, warehouse_code, drug_name, drug_alisa, expiration_time, insert_num, residue_num, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, is_delete,
#{id}, #{drugId}, #{warehouseCode}, #{drugName}, #{drugAlisa}, #{expirationTime}, #{insertNum}, #{residueNum}, #{createTime}, #{createBy}, #{updateTime}, #{updateBy}, #{isDelete},
mapper.delete:
delete from t_warehouse_manager where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: where drug_id = #{drugId} and residue_num > 0 and expire_status = '0' and is_delete = '0' order by expiration_time asc;
where expire_status = '0' and expiration_time < now() and residue_num > 0 and is_delete = '0'
